I like learning new stuff and play around with it

üìú Background Story

Computer engineering has been relevant since I was little. It was quite a journey for me as my parents have near to zero experience with computer which left me learning a lot about it by myself at an early age. Though my parents were quite supportive about it, as they let me took private course of Photoshop editing at middle school.

Learning new stuff on the internet and playing around with it have been something that I enjoy. From learning how to hack computer games, editing, and some other simple software skills, to programming softwares and websites.

I have decided to have an IT-degree since middle school and here I am, studying and pursuing my dream in Germany as a IT-student. I've learnt a lot about coding and software programming since I started college. But as any other developer would say, we won't stop learning as long as the earth spins. And that I'll do..

üë©üèΩ‚ÄçüöÄ Projects

  • 01

    Kuchen Automat

    A java program created solo as a university project on 2021. This software is created for the purpose of maintain/ administer a cake machine. It has the ability to manipulate cakes (CRUD) and at the same time automaticaly update the software GUI. Here I learned important aspects of a software such as unit tests, layer distribution, encapsulation, command line intefaces, thread safety, simple GUI, events, observers, and persistency.

  • 02

    Portfolio (This website)

    This portfolio is created using Three.js and with the purpose of listing all of my projects that I made/ contributed to. Here I took the first step towards 3 dimensional website programming and animation. Things that I learned includes camera, renderer, scene and css styling with animation. All credits to Fireship for teaching how to make 3d portfolio. Link to his youtube on github link below.

  • 03

    Kuchen Automat3

    A java program created solo as a university project on 2021. This software is created for the purpose of maintain/ administer a cake machine. It has the ability to manipulate cakes (CRUD) and at the same time automaticaly update the software GUI. Here I learned important aspects of a software such as unit tests, layer distribution, encapsulation, command line intefaces, thread safety, simple GUI, events, observers, and persistency.

    Kuchen Automat4

    A java program created solo as a university project on 2021. This software is created for the purpose of maintain/ administer a cake machine. It has the ability to manipulate cakes (CRUD) and at the same time automaticaly update the software GUI.
